content: > free pattern is available on the blog click the link below > use code - lovebags - to get 4 of the latest bag design for 9 90$ get the bundle here- https //www ravelry com/redeem/passionatecrafter code=lovebags crochet tote bag pattern is a perfect accessory for the summer made using a 3mm cotton macrame yarn the bag became sturdy enough to hold all your items you can also use a different weight yarn to get a similar result as mine the pattern is very easy to follow and beginner-friendly the stitches used are double_crochet half_double_crochet single_crochet and chain stitch the yarn is 3mm cotton macrame yarn 200g/ 120m and the total amount used is 575g the crochet hook needed is 4mm there is a video tutorial to guide you throughout the pattern if you have any difficulties following written instructions final measurements 36 cm x 12 cm x 35 cm without the straps this summer tote bag is worked from the bottom up without any seaming first we will make the base then we will continue with the body and make the straps/ handles
